{{cpp/chrono/year_month/title|year|month}}
{{cpp/chrono/year_month/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr std::chrono::year year() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::chrono::month month() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves the year and month values stored in this {{tt|year_month}} object.

===Return value===
@1@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::year}} value.
@2@ Returns the stored {{lc|std::chrono::month}} value.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    constexpr auto ym{std::chrono::year(2021)/std::chrono::July};  
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (ym.year() == std::chrono::year(2021)) &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (ym.month() == std::chrono::month(7)) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true true
}}
